divs: sighting detailsthere was four of us in the livingroom watching the football game, i was looking out the front window to the right of the tv screen and saw the ufo bright red\orange just hovering there for about 10 seconds when i jumped up and told the others to look at it.i opened the front door and we stood on the porch and watched it for maybe a good 10 minutes hovering over the town then go out to where the airport is hovering around there for awhile then continue on to the north north east. i have always believed in ufo's and to have actually see one and watch it i thought it was pretty cool to finely have the opportunity.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Walla Walla
There were no other sightings in Walla Walla on or around October 17th 2013
Summary: cone shaped,brigh/orange flashing lights white light on very bottom tip that flashed intermitantly appeared to hover over the town then over the airport then continued to the north north east
